channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 11:18 A. Run in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 11:18 A. Run in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Watch for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 10:57 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 10:57 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk.
